GSD.description:
ALSA: hda: Fix UAF of leds class devs at unbinding

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.8 by commit 813e9f3e06d22e29872d4fd51b54992d89cf66c8. For more details please see the references link.
